name: Custom meta description
description: Replaces the theme provided description by a configurable, context aware, custom one. Enables you to e.g. use the album title as description. Supports lens variable.

albums.label: Albums
albums.info: Configuration for album lists. You can combine lens syntax and static text.  E.g. 'My Album: {{ album.title }}. Leave empty if you want to use the default description provided by the theme. Hint: Depending on you theme, this might be your root page.'

album.label: Album
album.info: Configuration for album page. You can combine lens syntax and static text. E.g. 'My Album: {{ album.title }}'. Leave empty if you want to use the default description provided by the theme.

content.label: Content
content.info: Configuration for content detail page. You can combine lens syntax and static text. E.g. 'My Album: {{ album.title }}'. Leave empty if you want to use the default description provided by the theme.
